title: Sprint 01
description: Sprint 01 execution epic. All sprint-01 issues must be linked as children and share sprint-01 label.

title: Search screen skeleton UI
description: Search input, mock 5 results, 'On drive' badge, download button. Loading/empty/hint states.

title: Mobile: implement .musicdb copy-sync lifecycle
description: Build database.service.ts flow for USB mirror copy, open local DB, write-through sync-back, and reconnect-safe cleanup.
notes: Implemented database lifecycle attach/detach/init with local mirror persistence, immediate sync-on-write behavior, and playlist/song CRUD used by app flows.

title: Setup dev branch and verify backend project
description: Create dev branch, verify TypeScript compiles, add GET /health endpoint.

title: Backend: implement /playlist-info endpoint
description: Add playlist metadata endpoint using yt-dlp flat-playlist output mapped into PlaylistInfo and SearchResult entries.
notes: Implemented playlist-info mapping with typed yt-dlp error handling and resilient parsing of flat-playlist results.

title: Backend: implement /search yt-dlp adapter
description: Add search route and service parsing ytsearch JSON into SearchResult contract with robust stderr/non-zero exit handling.
notes: Implemented robust yt-dlp search adapter with ENOENT handling, JSON line parsing safeguards, and source_url filtering; route now maps typed yt-dlp errors to 422/500.

title: Library screen skeleton UI
description: 8 mock songs, sort chips (Title/Artist/Album/Date), long-press action sheet (Edit/Playlist/Delete).

title: Backend: implement streaming /download endpoint
description: Pipe yt-dlp mp3 stdout directly to Fastify reply, enforce API key middleware, and terminate subprocess on client disconnect.
notes: Completed: improved /download stream handling for ENOENT spawn failures, pre-stream non-zero exit mapping to 422, and client-disconnect process termination.

title: Sprint 02
description: Sprint 02 focuses on multi-use token configuration via YAML and secure token routing for backend/mobile flows.

title: Backend: add YAML token config loader
description: Introduce token configuration file parsing, validation, and hot-safe cache for multi-use token policies.

title: Backend: replace single API_KEY middleware with token policy auth
description: Authorize requests using token ID/secret from YAML map, enforce enabled flags, endpoint scopes, and optional rate limits.

title: Mobile: settings support token profile selection
description: Allow selecting token profile and sending token credentials/header format required by backend YAML token policy.

title: Docs: define YAML token schema and migration plan
description: Document schema, examples, backward compatibility from API_KEY, error model, and rotation workflow.
notes: Orchestrator docs-first kickoff: write sprint-02 contract in docs/task/sprint02.md, then update overview/mobile/backend docs with YAML token policy, API request/response changes, migration and validation plan.

title: QA: validate token policy scenarios
description: Add manual/automated checks for valid token, disabled token, scope mismatch, malformed YAML, and fallback behavior.

title: USB Manager screen skeleton UI
description: Status card with storage bar (reads useUSBStore), mock Music/ file list with delete buttons.

title: Mobile: implement SAF JS bridge service
description: Implement usb.service.ts wrappers for listDirectory/writeFile/readFile/deleteFile/getStorageInfo with typed errors and URI validation.
notes: Implemented usb.service typed bridge with module availability checks, SAF URI validation, and explicit errors for invalid parameters.

title: Setup React Navigation bottom tabs and USBStatusBar
description: Replace Expo placeholder with bottom tab navigator (Search, Library, USB, Settings). USBStatusBar pinned above tabs.

title: Mobile: wire download flow end-to-end
description: Connect search result action to backend /download stream, temp file write, USB write, DB insert, and queue/progress store updates.
notes: Wired Search download action to backend/API, queue status updates, USB write, DB insert, and result badge refresh after successful save.

title: Settings screen skeleton UI
description: Backend URL + API Key inputs, Save button, Clear temp files confirmation, app version row.
